annotations.description: In this video I defy Marius' contention that Tiki has no place in Fall, or when doing Fall cocktails! I don't agree! This video is a wager between us and I w...
annotations.title: White Negroni Pi√±a Colada

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Mezcal
.5oz (15ml) Suze
.5oz (15ml) Coconut Liqueur
.75oz (22.5ml) Pineapple Juice
.5oz (15ml) Lemon Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Simple Syrup
Top Angostura Bitters
Pineapple Frond Garnish

Shake and strain into rocks glass over ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z029rqleOYU
title: White Negroni Pina Colada
